mapper.sql: id, project_code, project_name, project_user_id, service_object_id, daily_module_id, work_start_time, morning_end_time, after_start_time, work_end_time, overwork_start_time, overtime_pay, holiday_overtime_coefficient, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, remark1, remark2, remark3, weekend_overtime_coefficient
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_project
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_project (id, project_code, project_name, project_user_id, service_object_id, daily_module_id, work_start_time, work_end_time, overwork_start_time, overtime_pay, holiday_overtime_coefficient, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, remark1, remark2,morning_end_time,after_start_time, weekend_overtime_coefficient remark3) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyModuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{workEndTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{overworkStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{overtimePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{holidayOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{morningEndTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{afterStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{weekendOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=TIME})

mapper.update:
update t_project
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_code = #{record.projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_name = #{record.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_user_id = #{record.projectUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_object_id = #{record.serviceObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
daily_module_id = #{record.dailyModuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_start_time = #{record.workStartTime,jdbcType=TIME},
morning_end_time = #{record.morningEndTime,jdbcType=TIME},
after_start_time = #{record.afterStartTime,jdbcType=TIME},
work_end_time = #{record.workEndTime,jdbcType=TIME},
overwork_start_time = #{record.overworkStartTime,jdbcType=TIME},
overtime_pay = #{record.overtimePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
holiday_overtime_coefficient = #{record.holidayOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
weekend_overtime_coefficient = #{record.weekendOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{record.updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_project set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_code = #{record.projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{record.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_user_id = #{record.projectUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_object_id = #{record.serviceObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daily_module_id = #{record.dailyModuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_start_time = #{record.workStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, morning_end_time = #{record.morningEndTime,jdbcType=TIME}, after_start_time = #{record.afterStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, work_end_time = #{record.workEndTime,jdbcType=TIME}, overwork_start_time = #{record.overworkStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, overtime_pay = #{record.overtimePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, holiday_overtime_coefficient = #{record.holidayOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weekend_overtime_coefficient = #{record.weekendOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{record.updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_project
project_code = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_user_id = #{projectUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_object_id = #{serviceObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
daily_module_id = #{dailyModuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_start_time = #{workStartTime,jdbcType=TIME},
morning_end_time = #{morningEndTime,jdbcType=TIME},
after_start_time = #{afterStartTime,jdbcType=TIME},
work_end_time = #{workEndTime,jdbcType=TIME},
overwork_start_time = #{overworkStartTime,jdbcType=TIME},
overtime_pay = #{overtimePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
holiday_overtime_coefficient = #{holidayOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
weekend_overtime_coefficient = #{weekendOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_project set project_code = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_user_id = #{projectUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_object_id = #{serviceObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daily_module_id = #{dailyModuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_start_time = #{workStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, work_end_time = #{workEndTime,jdbcType=TIME}, overwork_start_time = #{overworkStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, overtime_pay = #{overtimePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, holiday_overtime_coefficient = #{holidayOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, morning_end_time = #{morningEndTime,jdbcType=TIME}, after_start_time = #{afterStartTime,jdbcType=TIME}, weekend_overtime_coefficient = #{weekendOvertimeCoefficient,jdbcType=TIME} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id, t1.project_code, t1.project_name, t1.project_user_id, t1.service_object_id, t1.daily_module_id, t1.work_start_time, t1.work_end_time, t1.overwork_start_time, t1.overtime_pay, t1.holiday_overtime_coefficient, t1.create_time, t1.create_user_id, t1.update_time, t1.update_user_id, t1.remark1, t1.remark2, t1.remark3,t2.user_name, t1.morning_end_time, t1.after_start_time, t1.weekend_overtime_coefficient FROM t_project t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 on t2.user_id = t1.project_user_id WHERE 1=1
order by t1.create_time asc

select t1.id, t1.project_code, t1.project_name, t1.project_user_id, t1.service_object_id, t1.daily_module_id, t1.work_start_time, t1.work_end_time, t1.overwork_start_time, t1.overtime_pay, t1.holiday_overtime_coefficient, t1.create_time, t1.create_user_id, t1.update_time, t1.update_user_id, t1.remark1, t1.remark2, t1.remark3,t2.user_name, t1.morning_end_time, t1.after_start_time, t1.weekend_overtime_coefficient, t2.email FROM t_project t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 on t2.user_id = t1.project_user_id where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t1.id, t1.project_code, t1.project_name, t1.project_user_id, t1.service_object_id, t1.daily_module_id, t1.work_start_time, t1.work_end_time, t1.overwork_start_time, t1.overtime_pay, t1.holiday_overtime_coefficient, t1.create_time, t1.create_user_id, t1.update_time, t1.update_user_id, t1.remark1, t1.remark2, t1.morning_end_time, t1.after_start_time, t1.weekend_overtime_coefficient, t1.remark3, t3.user_name FROM t_user_project t2 LEFT JOIN t_project t1 on t1.id = t2.project_id LEFT JOIN t_user t3 on t3.user_id = t1.project_user_id WHERE t2.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t1.id, t1.project_code, t1.project_name, t1.project_user_id, t1.service_object_id, t1.daily_module_id, t1.work_start_time, t1.work_end_time, t1.overwork_start_time, t1.overtime_pay, t1.holiday_overtime_coefficient, t1.create_time, t1.create_user_id, t1.update_time, t1.update_user_id, t1.remark1, t1.remark2, t1.remark3,t2.user_name, t1.morning_end_time, t1.after_start_time, t1.weekend_overtime_coefficient, t3.user_name currentUserName,t3.email currentUserEmail FROM t_project t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 on t2.user_id = t1.project_user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_project tup ON tup.project_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_user t3 on t3.user_id = tup.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND tup.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by t1.create_time asc

SELECT tp.id, tp.work_start_time, tp.work_end_time, tp.overwork_start_time, tp.overtime_pay, tp.holiday_overtime_coefficient, td.user_id, td.daily_date, tp.morning_end_time, tp.after_start_time FROM t_project tp LEFT JOIN t_daily td on tp.id = td.project_id WHERE 1=1 AND td.daily_id = #{dailyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
